id.description: The unique ID of the visit.

prospect_id.description: The ID of the prospect associated with the visit.

visitor_page_view_count.description: The count of page views by the visitor.

visitor_page_views.description: Details of the page views by the visitor.

first_visitor_page_view_at.description: The date and time of the first page view by the visitor.

last_visitor_page_view_at.description: The date and time of the last page view by the visitor.

duration_in_seconds.description: The duration of the visit in seconds.

campaign_parameter.description: The campaign parameter for tracking purposes.

medium_parameter.description: The medium parameter for tracking purposes.

source_parameter.description: The source parameter for tracking purposes.

content_parameter.description: The content parameter for tracking purposes.

term_parameter.description: The term parameter for tracking purposes.

created_at.description: The date and time when the visit was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the visit was last updated.

type_name.description: The name of the visit type.

details.description: Additional details or notes related to the visit.

campaign.description: The campaign associated with the visit.

email_id.description: The ID of the email associated with the visit.

email.description: The email associated with the visit.

list_email_id.description: The ID of the list email associated with the visit.

email_template_id.description: The ID of the email template used for the visit.
